name: Roric Amakiir
pt: I lie about almost everything, even when theres no good reason to. I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong
ideals: I'm loyal to my friends, not any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care.
bonds: Ruthless rivals murdered most of my outfit, and left the rest of us to die. Vengence will be ours.
flaws: I can't resist swindling people who are more powerful than me
